storyInfo:
Candela thanks Hoshiguma and the gang for their actions and invites them to stay with her.
On the ship, Ch'en and Lin Yühsia debate among themselves and settle on a course of action.

attributes.content: *Cough*... Testing, 1, 2, 3. Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: My dear citizens and friends, as well as our beloved tourists from afar, Candela speaking.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: First, please don't be alarmed.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I will admit that I did not see Old Pancho's plan coming.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I never expected that my trusted subordinate would do something as horrifying as to plot against me to take this city. How terrifying!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: However, as I said in the beginning, this is no cause for alarm.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Rather, I must give Pancho my thanks.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: To be honest, I've been wondering for the past two years what we could do to make the championship more exciting, more eye-opening, and more thrilling to all of us.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And I've never found a particularly nice way to do this.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Yet Pancho's found it. Through his actions, he's putting on an even more exciting championship!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Think the championship's over?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: No, not at all. At that very moment, our championship has reached its true climax!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: At this point in time, all teams are revived, and betting has reopened.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Stop the troublemakers that are sowing chaos in the city to the best of your ability. I know you can.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And once everything comes to a successful conclusion, you will be adequately rewarded.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, you must be the ones. My subordinates told me you helped them foil a plan to assassinate me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Come, sit with me. As your reward, you may sit here in the front row to enjoy this match with me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Are you... serious?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Of course. I'm always serious.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Pancho knows he wouldn't stand much of a chance if he flipped the table right in front of me.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And that's why he's holing up in the ship I entrusted to him.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And if my guess is correct, he probably added quite a few features to it in secret. Maybe a cannon or two?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: But if that was all there was to it, it would hardly be a threat.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Between the second and third rounds, we invite dignitaries from all factions to board the ship so they may enjoy the competition in person.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, I see. The dignitaries. That's the key here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The city's operations depend on dealing with them.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Right, right, right. It isn't a matter of whether I want to solve this problem of his or not, but whether the bigwigs' underlings want me to solve his problem right away.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Tsk, making such a huge ruckus, only by playing dirty.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It was probably Ernesto who taught him that.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Well, as you can see, there isn't much I can do, and there isn't much that he can do either.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: In that case, we might as well make things more interesting.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Wouldn't that be provoking him...?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: If he actually dragged the brass hats out to slaughter one by one, he wouldn't be doing much with the city even if I handed him the keys.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You don't get it, Missy. He wants to take over the city and take it to war, so he needs the big shots' backing.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Otherwise, he wouldn't have the money or manpower to actually go to war.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And if I had to guess, some of the big shots on the ship might already have come to an agreement with him.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh? Now I'm taking an interest in you young ladies. From the way you are dressed, I suppose you're not from Bolívar?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Haha, we are from Lungmen, and two of our friends happen to be on the ship.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hm? So you are friends of Ch'en and Lin? They didn't mention you at all.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: We didn't tell them we'd be here on a vacation, so that makes sense.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hahaha, I see.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: In that case, let me tell you one more thing—
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: I gave Ch'en and Lin this mission, but I also promised Lady Fumizuki that they would not come to harm during their stay here.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Do you know what that means?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It means it's not yet time.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You know your stuff, young lady of Higashi.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: And if something does happen to them, then I'm afraid the old men on the ship will find themselves lost at sea, thanks to Pancho.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Missy, don't be scared.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Come, come. They say that it takes a fight to get to know each other. It just happens there's one unfolding before us. Come, sit down. Let's talk.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You done?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Done.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Things don't look good here, though.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Looks like having you deal with Ernesto while I investigate didn't save us enough time.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Not happy about it?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Not one bit... but not much I can do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This whole affair isn't all that simple. We knew that ahead of time, no?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I didn't expect things to get so out of hand, though.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You scared?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Where are you now?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: In one of the cabins.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I took a stroll around while you had your chat with Ernesto. The atmosphere wasn't all that tense before Pancho put his plans in motion, though.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But right after his speech, the crew and the sailors started to make their move.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The whole ship is on high alert now, and they are very well-supplied and well-equipped.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sounds like you're ready for a seesaw battle?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We aren't completely out of options just yet.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How do you figure?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They locked all the dignitaries in a single room.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Common practice among thugs... Hold on.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let's start with the hostages.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Looks like you figured it out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how many weapons they have on the ship, how well supplied they are, and how many men they have to support them on land, Lady Candela has control here. The best outcome he can hope for is a draw.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The odds will be against him if it drags out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: These hostages are basically his lifeline.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Heh, that's right. These dignitaries are high officials in the three governments.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: As hostages, they really help keep things in check.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It doesn't take very long. All he needs is a brief moment, he just needs Lady Candela to hesitate for a second.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Then he'll get to do so much more. He'll have so many more bargaining chips.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But there's only the two of us here.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: To be honest, I really am not into the idea of playing hero of justice with you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'll do it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll get their attention and leave the hostages to you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That could work. There should be a lifeboat on the ship, or we could make them jump into the sea and swim.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What happens after that?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You'll run after everyone's rescued?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: If you want to stay on the ship and play the hero, feel free.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I guess that's how it'll go, then.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So, should we begin?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Let's do it. Right, don't hang up. Stay in touch with me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ugh...? Where am I...?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hermano, are you okay?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: That Ch'en woman knocked you out.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Oh, right... Now I remember...
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Things are proceeding according to plan. A few of the bigwigs have already agreed to help Papa.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Wait, where's Ch'en?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It seems she's been causing a ruckus all over the ship after knocking you out. Papa ordered everyone to find and capture her.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Causing a ruckus... No.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Rafaela, check the hostage holding area right away.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Ch'en might be creating an opening for Lin.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We're in trouble if they manage to save the hostages.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But what about you...?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I'm fine. Now go.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: An old friend once told me, I have to take a beating before I can learn, like a young her, that being a stubborn ass is just a stupid impulse.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And even now, I've got no idea what kind of stubbornness I'm supposed to stick to and what counts as an unrealistic, stupid impulse.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But my guess is she probably knows that's not enough to stop me, or my name isn't Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Good for you, Miss Ch'en. You know what you are doing and what you must do.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But me?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Ernesto struggles to his feet and stumbles out of the room.
